EmailTemplate.name: Orders PFECN
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ – Place Orders on MyAerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!CCMI__Work__c.CCMI__Date__c}
Order Entry Request Action Required
Dear Customer,
Honeywell no longer monitors this email address. To place an order with Honeywell, please visit the MyAerospace portal and utilize:
Online Ordering
For all future parts quoting, ordering, and tracking needs, please use Honeywell’s MyAerospace customer portal.
Not a current MyAerospace user?
• Register for MyAerospace here.
• View our online tools updates here and tutorials here.
If this is a request for an aircraft on ground (AOG), please reference this page for our latest contact information: Aircraft on Ground
• Learn how to submit an AOG on the MyAerospace portal here.
If you think you have received this message in error, please contact us through our form on the MyAerospace portal.
Obtain the latest order information 24x7 by accessing Order Status. We appreciate your business.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support
